Summary

In this activity students will analyze various forms of primary sources, images and text, based on differing accounts of the Boston Massacre. Students will use this information to construct a historically accurate timeline (story) using Twine.

Objectives

The students will be able to...

  • Extract information from an image
  • Extract information from a written primary source
  • Re-classify information based on similar characteristics
  • Analyze information that has been gathered and organized
  • Investigate and understand the effect bias has on the recounting of history
